entities.description: "San Francisco is a city experiencing a problem with retailers fleeing its downtown area, which is a problem occurring in cities across the country."
"North Korea is a country claiming to have made progress in miniaturizing nuclear warheads and making missiles harder to intercept."
"Boris Johnson is an ex-leader who, according to a committee, deliberately misled lawmakers about parties he held mid-pandemic."
"Wes Anderson is a film director known for his latest film 'Asteroid City,' which is described as comic and wry with a tragic soul."
"Los Angeles Country Club is a location where the U.S. Open is played, and navigating the barranca is crucial for golfers."
"The Mets are a baseball team that experienced sloppy play but managed to win against the Yankees."
"Glenda Jackson was a two-time Oscar winner who left acting to enter the British Parliament and later returned to Broadway; she passed away at the age of 87."
"An event where retailers are fleeing from urban malls, which is a problem occurring in cities across the country including San Francisco."
"The central bank is projecting that inflation will remain too high for too long, signaling that it is not done with its current policies."
"A report from the U.K. that faults ex-leader Boris Johnson for deliberately misleading lawmakers about parties he held mid-pandemic."

"The event of Airman Jack Teixeira being indicted for posting secret intelligence reports on a social media server, charged with six counts of retaining and transmitting classified national defense information."
"Jack Teixeira is an airman who was indicted for leaking secret intelligence reports on a social media server."
"The power infrastructure is divided into a patchwork of operators with competing interests, making it hard to build the long-distance lines needed to transport wind and solar energy nationwide."
"The event of trying to transport wind and solar energy nationwide, which is complicated by the divided power infrastructure."

relationships.description: "The Exodus From Urban Malls might be related to the economic policies of the Central Bank, which is signaling that inflation will remain high."
"The U.K. Report faults Boris Johnson for his actions during the pandemic."
"Jack Teixeira is the central figure in the Airman in Files Leak event."

entities.description: "The Justice Department is an organization that has traditionally operated independently from the White House, but Trump has pressured it to align more with his political control."
"The White House represents the executive branch of the U.S. government, which Trump has attempted to exert more control over the Justice Department."
"The F.B.I. is part of the larger movement on the right that aims to gut the organization, as conservatives claim it has been weaponized against them."

"The Center for Renewing America is a Washington-based organization where two key figures, Jeffrey B. Clark and Russell T. Vought, work, and are involved in efforts to overhaul the Justice Department."
"Jeffrey B. Clark is a person who oversaw the Justice Department's civil and environmental divisions and was the only senior official who tried to help Trump overturn the 2020 election."
"Russell T. Vought is a person who served as the director of the Office of Management and Budget during the Trump presidency and is involved in efforts to overhaul the Justice Department."
"Washington is a geographical location where the Center for Renewing America is based and where significant political activities take place."
"The Supreme Court is the highest court in the U.S., which upheld a 1978 law aimed at keeping Native American adoptees with their tribes and traditions."
"Native American adoptees are individuals who are the subject of a 1978 law upheld by the Supreme Court, aimed at keeping them with their tribes and traditions."
"Amy Coney Barrett is a person who wrote the majority opinion for the Supreme Court, affirming the power of Congress to make laws about Native American tribes and child welfare."
"The Indian Child Welfare Act is a 1978 law that was upheld by the Supreme Court, which gives preference to Native families in adoption cases."
"Clarence Thomas is a person who was one of the dissenting justices in the Supreme Court case regarding the Indian Child Welfare Act."
"Samuel A. Alito Jr. is a person who was one of the dissenting justices in the Supreme Court case regarding the Indian Child Welfare Act."
"Texas is a geographical location from where a white foster couple is involved in a case against five tribes and the Interior Department over the adoption of a Native American child."
"The Interior Department is an organization that battled with a white foster couple from Texas over the adoption of a Native American child."

"Shein is a rapidly growing fast fashion app that has progressively cut ties with its home country, China, and is expanding internationally, moving its headquarters to Singapore and setting up operations in Ireland and Indiana."

"TikTok is a viral social app that, like Shein, has become a target of American lawmakers due to accusations of using fabric made with forced labor and being a tool of the Chinese Communist Party, which TikTok denies."

"Eileen Isotalo is a 66-year-old retired interior design coordinator who struggled with weight loss and obesity-related medical problems until she started taking Wegovy, a new class of drug for obesity."
"Wegovy is a new class of drug for obesity that has helped Eileen Isotalo lose weight and alleviate her obesity-related medical problems."
"Weight Watchers is a weight management program that Eileen Isotalo first joined at the age of 14 in her efforts to lose weight."
"The University of Michigan is where Eileen Isotalo went to a weight management clinic, which prescribed her Wegovy, contributing to her significant weight loss."

"Marco Rubio is a Senator from Florida who has criticized Shein's efforts to distance itself from China, accusing the company of making clothes with fabric made with forced labor and being a tool of the Chinese Communist Party."

relationships.description: "Jeffrey B. Clark was a senior official at the Justice Department who tried to help Trump overturn the 2020 election."
"Eileen Isotalo has successfully used Wegovy to lose weight and alleviate obesity-related medical problems, indicating a positive relationship with the drug."
"Eileen Isotalo first tried to lose weight with Weight Watchers at the age of 14, indicating an early relationship with the weight management program."
"Eileen Isotalo sought help at the University of Michigan's weight management clinic, which led to her prescription of Wegovy and subsequent weight loss."
"Marco Rubio has criticized Shein for its alleged ties with China and questioned the company's efforts to distance itself from the country."

entities.description: "Velyka Komyshuvakha is a village in eastern Ukraine that was occupied by Russian forces and later retaken by Ukraine."
"Russian forces occupied a village in eastern Ukraine for four and a half months, using a local bar as a small outpost."
"The United States had counterinsurgency wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, where graffiti in military positions was common."
"Donald J. Trump was President of the United States and is involved in a federal case regarding documents."

"The F.B.I. is part of a larger movement on the right to gut and overhaul, which conservatives claim has been 'weaponized' against them."
